content.question: The French government issued the decree primarily in response to

choices.label: the use of new military tactics and technologies by opponents of the French Revolution
the lack of female support for the ideals of the French Revolution
domestic unrest and foreign aggression against the radical Revolutionary government
opposition to the trial of the French royal family by the French government

content.answer: domestic unrest and foreign aggression against the radical Revolutionary government

unit.text: 5: Conflict, Crisis, and Reaction in the Late 18th Century

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
